content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.0, -49.0) and (-12.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) and (-12.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-13.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -45.5), and (-13.5, -45.5)
- Transport Belts connecting furnaces and inserters
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) and (-13.5, -44.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-11.5, -44.5)

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the offshore pump to the boiler and steam engine

### Transport Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt Group connecting various furnaces and chests
- Transport Belts at positions (-11.5, -46.5) to (-9.5, -46.5), (-8.5, -45.5) to (-8.5, -43.5), (-16.5, -49.5) to (-16.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -45.5) to (-14.5, -47.5), (-13.5, -46.5) to (-11.5, -46.5), (-14.5, -45.5) to (-14.5, -43.5), (-13.5, -45.5) to (-11.5, -45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Inserters are Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available and reachable by the inserters to prevent them from waiting indefinitely.

### Errors when Inserters are Blocked
- Make sure there is sufficient space in the destination for inserters to place items. Clear any obstructions that might block the inserter's path.

### Errors when Inserting Items with Insufficient Inventory
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. This will prevent insertion errors due to lack of items.

### Errors when Inserters are Waiting for Space in Destination
- Ensure that the destination has enough capacity to accept the items being transferred by the inserters. Consider using larger storage or clearing existing items to make space.
